name: Bearer of the Heavens
originalText: When Bearer of the Heavens dies, destroy all permanents at the beginning of the next end step.

rulings.text: The effect of the ability will destroy all permanents on the battlefield as it resolves. It doesn't matter if those permanents were on the battlefield when Bearer of the Heavens died.
If Bearer of the Heavens dies during an end step, the delayed triggered ability will trigger at the beginning of the next turn's end step.
